name: Foxy and Wolf Lite
description:
New technologies change the World, but the real values reamin with us. Tales those are deared from our childhood return on modern iPad and iPhone devices. And with new possibility - animation and voice.
Foxy and Wolf is our new play book. It continues the series of traditional Russian fairy tales. We scored it for Rusian and English sounds. And now you can score it by your self for your child. It will be interesting and pleasured to be an actor for yourself and for your your children. Beautiful and kind pictures, easy interface and simple gameplay will do for your children. Every page includes surprises of animation. Try to find them all!
